snippet: Take Charge Indy, riding the rail, upstaged the early Kentucky Derby favorite Union Rags on a fast dirt track in the Florida Derby.
abstract: Take Charge Indy rides the rail to win Florida Derby and upstage early Kentucky Derby favorite Union Rags.
lead_paragraph: Take Charge Indy, riding the rail, upstaged the early Kentucky Derby favorite Union Rags on a fast dirt track in the Florida Derby.

headline.seo: Florida Derby — Take Charge Indy Upsets Union Rags
headline.main: Surprise in Florida Clouds Favorite’s Path to the Kentucky Derby
headline.print_headline: Surprise in Florida Clouds Favorite’s Path Toward the Kentucky Derby
